name: Criminals Transport: Truck Car
description:
Criminals Transport: Truck Car AMRY!!!
This time to drive police van to air plane and transport criminal involved in murder case amazing. It is greater task for a driver and pilot to carefully ride latest deluxe police van and aeroplane. Loading prisoners jail into big van to flying air plane and unload to the given destination. Pick and drop the hazardous criminal in to the jail is a unique simulation with stunning stylized Graphics and realistic wonderful environments.
Features.
• Realistic Graphics and Multiple army vehicles are there to drive.
• Heavy transport duty on the go
• Classic vehicle control in the army designed stiff conditions and rough environments.
• Heavy transport of weapon delivery and arsenal shifting
• War criminals capture and control
